alert.note: Alert for Green Lake; Marquette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 14 at 2:37PM CDT until April 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Into Early This Evening Toward Central Wisconsin... .A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until early this evening toward central Wisconsin for another round of critical fire weather conditions. Elevated to near critical fire weather conditions are expected elsewhere across southern Wisconsin. Very warm temperatures, very low relative humidity values and gusty south winds will lead to these conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR MARQUETTE AND GREEN LAKE COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Marquette and Green Lake Counties. * TIMING...Until 8 PM CDT this evening. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 MPH with gusts to 25 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 80s. * IMPACTS...Caution is advised when using outdoor fires and equipment that causes sparks. Make sure all outdoor fires are extinguished properly, and consult your local DNR office for possible burn bans.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
